mapper.sql: id, user_id, folder_name, folder_type, parent_id, level, is_del, create_time, update_time, reserved1, reserved2, reserved3
mapper.select:
select
from gb_folder_info t
t.is_del = 0
and t.parent_id = #{parentId, jdbcType=INTEGER}

select t1.id, t1.folder_name, t2.id as child_id, t2.folder_name as child_folder_name from gb_folder_info t1 left join (SELECT * FROM gb_folder_info t WHERE t.is_del = 0) t2 on t1.id = t2.parent_id
t1.level = 0 and t1.is_del = 0
and t1.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by t1.id ASC
mapper.insert:
insert into gb_folder_info
id,
user_id,
folder_name,
folder_type,
parent_id,
level,
is_del,
create_time,
update_time,
reserved1,
reserved2,
reserved3,

mapper.update:
update gb_folder_info
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
folder_name = #{folderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
folder_type = #{folderType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
reserved1 = #{reserved1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reserved2 = #{reserved2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reserved3 = #{reserved3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update gb_folder_info set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, folder_name = #{folderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, folder_type = #{folderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, reserved1 = #{reserved1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reserved2 = #{reserved2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reserved3 = #{reserved3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
